title: Leak confirms OpenAI is preparing ads on ChatGPT for public roll out
summary:
OpenAI is reportedly preparing to integrate advertisements into ChatGPT, a move that could significantly disrupt the web economy. Leaked references in the ChatGPT Android app beta (version 1.2025.329), spotted by Tibor on X, indicate an "ads feature," "bazaar content," "search ad," and "search ads carousel."

Unlike its current ad-free experience, OpenAI aims to replicate a model similar to Google Search, potentially leveraging its extensive user data for highly personalized ads. The article suggests ChatGPT might possess deeper user insights than Google, allowing for more effective ad targeting. Initially, ads are expected to be limited to the search experience within ChatGPT.

This initiative comes as ChatGPT boasts a rapidly growing user base, with approximately 800 million weekly users, up from 100 million in November 2023, and processing about 2.5 billion prompts daily. India has emerged as its largest user base. Given this massive reach, the article concludes that ads could prove highly successful for ChatGPT.
chinese_title: 曝OpenAI正准备在ChatGPT上线广告，面向公众推出
chinese_summary:

与目前无广告的体验不同，OpenAI旨在复制类似谷歌搜索的模式，可能利用其庞大的用户数据进行高度个性化的广告投放。文章指出，ChatGPT可能拥有比谷歌更深入的用户洞察力，从而实现更有效的广告定位。最初，广告预计将仅限于ChatGPT内的搜索体验。

这一举措出台之际，ChatGPT的用户群正迅速增长，每周用户量约8亿，高于2023年11月的1亿，并且每天处理约25亿条提示。印度已成为其最大的用户群。鉴于其巨大的覆盖范围，文章总结称广告对ChatGPT来说可能会非常成功。

title: All it takes is for one to work out
summary:
The author reflects on a period of profound uncertainty while applying to graduate school, having faced rejections previously and feeling disadvantaged by a less-than-ideal academic and professional profile. During this challenging time, a friend offered a recurring maxim: "All it takes is for one to work out." Despite initial skepticism, this proved true when a single acceptance changed the author's life.

This powerful framing, the author notes, is applicable to any high-stakes search. In job hunting, one only needs the right fit, not every offer. For housing, one just needs the place that feels like home. In relationships, one only needs that one person. And for education, a single university acceptance can open the right door.

These processes—like college admissions, job searches, home buying, or finding a partner—can be emotionally brutal and feel deeply personal. However, the simple truth that "All it takes is for one to work out" serves as a grounding reminder that a single success is all that's truly needed to achieve a life-changing outcome.
chinese_title: 只要有一个能成。
chinese_summary:
作者回顾了一段申请研究生时的深刻不确定时期，他之前曾遭遇拒绝，并因不理想的学术和职业背景而感到处于劣势。在这段充满挑战的时期，一位朋友反复对他说一句格言：“只要有一个能成功就行。” 尽管作者最初持怀疑态度，但当他最终获得一个录取并改变了他的人生时，这句话被证明是真实的。

作者指出，这种有力的理念适用于任何高风险的寻觅。在求职中，人们只需要找到一份合适的，而非获得每一个工作机会。对住房而言，只需要找到一个像家一样的地方。在人际关系中，只需要那一个人。而在教育方面，一个大学录取通知书就能打开正确的门。

然而，这些过程——例如大学录取、求职、购房或寻找伴侣——可能令人心力交瘁，且带有强烈的个人色彩。然而，“只要有一个能成功就行”这个简单的真理，却是一个清醒的提醒，它告诉我们，一次成功就足以实现改变人生的结果。

title: Airbus A320 – intense solar radiation may corrupt data critical for flight
summary:
Airbus announced on November 28, 2025, that analysis of a recent event revealed intense solar radiation can corrupt data critical for the flight controls of its A320 Family aircraft. A significant number of in-service A320 Family aircraft are potentially impacted by this issue.

In response, Airbus has proactively collaborated with aviation authorities to request immediate precautionary action from operators. This request, issued via an Alert Operators Transmission (AOT), instructs operators to implement available software and/or hardware protections to ensure the continued safety of the fleet. This AOT will be formalized by an Emergency Airworthiness Directive (EAD) from the European Union Aviation Safety Agency (EASA).

Airbus acknowledged that these necessary recommendations will cause operational disruptions for passengers and customers, and apologized for any inconvenience. The company stated it would work closely with operators, affirming that safety remains its paramount priority.

空客承认，这些必要的建议将给乘客和客户造成运营中断，并对由此带来的不便表示歉意。该公司表示将与运营商密切合作，强调安全仍然是其最优先的考虑。

title: Bazzite: Operating System for Linux gaming
summary:
Bazzite is a Fedora-based Linux operating system specifically designed for gaming, catering to both newcomers and enthusiasts. It comes with Steam and Lutris pre-installed, enabling seamless integration of games from various platforms like Xbox Game Pass, Epic Games Store, and GOG.com directly into Steam Gaming Mode. The OS boasts features like HDR & VRR support, optimized CPU schedulers, and numerous community-developed tools to enhance gaming and streaming.

A core strength of Bazzite is its extensive hardware compatibility, offering out-of-the-box support for Nvidia, AMD, and Intel GPUs, a wide range of game controllers (Xbox, PS, Switch), and essential drivers. It includes specialized "Handheld Daemon" functionality for devices like ASUS ROG Ally, Lenovo Legion Go, Ayn, and GPD, providing deep control over hardware settings and customization.

Bazzite prioritizes stability and security through image-based updates that allow fear-free rollbacks to previous versions. It offers enterprise-class security with SELinux, Secure Boot support, and LUKS disk encryption. Users can choose between the highly customizable KDE Plasma (based on Fedora Kinoite with SteamOS themes) or the touch-optimized GNOME (based on Fedora Silverblue).

Application management is robust, leveraging the Bazaar app store (Flathub) and advanced container support via Distrobox and Waydroid for Android apps. Bazzite promotes portability, allowing shared MicroSD game libraries across multiple devices. The OS has garnered significant positive testimonials for its superior performance, battery life, and ease of use, particularly on handheld gaming PCs, often outperforming Windows. It is actively developed by Universal Blue with strong community support and extensive documentation.

title: Advent of Code 2025
summary:
Eric Wastl created Advent of Code (AoC), an annual Advent calendar offering small programming puzzles for various skill levels and languages. It's suitable for interview prep, training, coursework, or personal challenges, requiring only basic programming knowledge and problem-solving skills, not a computer science background. Solutions are designed to run efficiently on older hardware. Support for AoC can be provided by sharing it with others or via AoC++.

General tips for solving puzzles include verifying solutions against examples, re-reading descriptions, creating custom test cases, ensuring the entire input is used, and seeking help if stuck.

Key FAQs cover triple-clicking to select code blocks, OAuth-based authentication (never giving credentials directly to AoC), and the varying difficulty of puzzles. Puzzles unlock at midnight EST/UTC-5 due to the author's availability. Puzzle ideas are not accepted due to legal concerns. The global leaderboard was removed due to stress and misuse; participants are encouraged to use private leaderboards with agreed-upon rules. Using AI to solve puzzles is discouraged as they are designed for human problem-solving, not AI prompting practice. Copying or redistributing AoC content, such as puzzle text or site design, is prohibited, as Advent of Code is a registered trademark, though linking to or referencing puzzles is permitted. User solution implementations are not owned by AoC.

Eric Wastl is credited with the puzzles, code, and design, supported by beta testers and community managers.

title: Datacenters in space aren't going to work
summary:
A former NASA engineer and Google Cloud AI specialist contends that datacenters in space, particularly for AI, are a "catastrophically bad idea" due to fundamental challenges.

**Power:** Space offers no abundant power. An ISS-sized solar array (200kW) could power only about 200 modern GPUs (roughly three server racks). Matching a 100,000-GPU datacenter would require 500 such enormous satellites. Nuclear radioisotope generators are woefully insufficient.

**Thermal Regulation:** Space's vacuum means no convection cooling. Heat transfer relies on conduction and radiation. Cooling 200 GPUs (200kW) would necessitate a radiator panel system of approximately 531 square metres, significantly larger than the entire ISS thermal system, for minimal compute capacity.

**Radiation Tolerance:** Space radiation causes single-event upsets (bit flips), single-event latch-ups (permanent damage), and long-term performance degradation. Modern GPUs/TPUs, with their small geometries and large die areas, are highly vulnerable. Shielding is largely impractical due to mass, and designing radiation-hardened chips drastically reduces performance to that of decades-old processors, making them unsuitable for AI.

**Communications:** Satellite communication typically yields only about 1Gbps, a fraction of the 100Gbps+ bandwidth common in ground-based datacenters.

Ultimately, the author concludes that space datacenters would be disproportionately costly, extremely difficult to implement, and deliver only mediocre performance, rendering the concept unfeasible.
chinese_title: 太空数据中心行不通
chinese_summary:
一名前NASA工程师和谷歌云人工智能专家认为，由于根本性挑战，太空数据中心，尤其是用于人工智能的数据中心，是一个“灾难性的糟糕主意”。

**供电：** 太空没有充足的电力供应。一个国际空间站大小的太阳能电池阵列（200千瓦）只能为大约200个现代GPU（约三个服务器机架）供电。若要匹配一个10万个GPU的数据中心，将需要500颗如此庞大的卫星。核放射性同位素发电机远远不足。

**热管理：** 太空真空意味着没有对流冷却。热量传递依赖于传导和辐射。冷却200个GPU（200千瓦）将需要一个大约531平方米的散热器面板系统，这显著大于整个国际空间站的热管理系统，仅能提供最少的计算能力。

**抗辐射能力：** 空间辐射会导致单粒子翻转（位翻转）、单粒子锁定（永久性损坏）和长期性能退化。现代GPU/TPU，由于其小尺寸工艺和大裸片面积，极易受损。由于质量原因，屏蔽在很大程度上不切实际，而设计抗辐射芯片会大幅降低性能，降至几十年前处理器水平，使它们不适用于人工智能。

**通信：** 卫星通信通常只能达到大约1Gbps，仅为地面数据中心常见的100Gbps以上带宽的一小部分。

最终，作者得出结论，空间数据中心成本将高得不成比例，实施起来极其困难，并且只能提供平庸的性能，使得这一概念不可行。

title: Americans no longer see four-year college degrees as worth the cost
summary:
A new NBC News poll reveals a dramatic decline in how Americans perceive the value of a four-year college degree. Just 33% of registered voters now believe it's "worth the cost" for better job prospects and higher earnings, a significant drop from 53% in 2013. Conversely, 63% now consider it "not worth the cost" due to substantial debt and a perceived lack of specific job skills.

This eye-popping shift over 12 years is largely driven by soaring tuition prices; inflation-adjusted costs for public four-year colleges have doubled since 1995, and private college tuition is up 75%. Rapid changes in the modern economy, including AI advancements, also contribute to the skepticism.

The decline in sentiment is widespread, affecting virtually every demographic. Republicans show the most dramatic shift (55% worth it in 2013 to 22% now), while Democrats also saw a significant drop (61% to 47%). Notably, less than half (46%) of voters with college degrees now deem them worth the cost, down from 63%.

Graduates like Jacob Kennedy exemplify the struggle, often finding entry-level jobs don't cover student loan debt, pushing them back to service industry roles. Jessica Burns emphasizes that while a degree is often a prerequisite for interviews, its intrinsic value is overshadowed by its prohibitive cost.

This has fueled a surge in interest in technical, vocational, and two-year programs, as students prioritize faster entry into the workforce. Experts view this as a "remarkable" societal shift, signaling a crisis for higher education which is increasingly seen as out of touch and inaccessible, eroding its status as a core component of the American Dream.
chinese_title: 美国人不再认为四年制大学学位物有所值。
chinese_summary:
一项新的NBC新闻民意调查显示，美国人对四年制大学学位的价值看法出现显著下降。如今，只有33%的注册选民认为，为了更好的就业前景和更高收入，大学学位“物有所值”，与2013年的53%相比大幅下降。反之，63%的人认为，由于巨额债务和缺乏具体职业技能，大学学位“不值那个价”。

12年间这种惊人的转变，主要由飙升的学费所致；自1995年以来，公立四年制大学经通胀调整后的费用翻了一番，而私立大学学费则上涨了75%。现代经济的快速变化，包括人工智能的进步，也加剧了这种怀疑。

这种情绪下降是普遍的，几乎影响了所有人群。共和党人的转变最为剧烈（从2013年的55%认为物有所值降至现在的22%），民主党人也出现了显著下降（从61%降至47%）。值得注意的是，如今只有不到一半（46%）拥有大学学位的选民认为其物有所值，低于此前的63%。

雅各布·肯尼迪等毕业生就体现了这种困境，他们常发现入门级工作不足以偿还学生贷款，这迫使他们重返服务行业。杰西卡·伯恩斯强调，虽然学位通常是面试的先决条件，但其内在价值被其高昂的成本所掩盖。

这激发了人们对技术、职业和两年制课程的兴趣激增，因为学生们更看重更快地进入劳动力市场。专家们认为，这是一个“显著”的社会转变，预示着高等教育的危机，高等教育正被越来越多地视为脱节且难以企及，这侵蚀了其作为“美国梦”核心组成部分的地位。

title: Zigbook Is Plagiarizing the Zigtools Playground
summary:
Zigtools has accused Zigbook of plagiarizing its custom-made Zigtools Playground, urging the community to avoid the latter. Zigbook, initially criticized for its "LLM slop" content and suspicious marketing, recently launched a "high-voltage beta" playground feature.

Zigtools investigated and found Zigbook's WASM blobs (zig.wasm, zls.wasm), which are custom-built for Zigtools' own client-side playground, were byte-for-byte identical. Further analysis revealed copied JavaScript code, some distorted by LLM, but with identical sections. Notably, Zigbook copied the ZLS WASM binary but failed to include the essential JavaScript API required for ZLS functionality, indicating a lack of understanding.

While Zigtools' Playground is MIT licensed, allowing copying with attribution, Zigbook violated these terms by not reproducing the required copyright and license notices. Zigtools issued a neutral pull request to correct this, but Zigbook quickly closed it and deleted the description.

This incident prompted Zigtools to warn the community, recommend official Zig resources, and refocus efforts on enhancing their own playground (e.g., multifile support, DWARF debugging). They are also using this opportunity to fundraise for ZLS's full-time maintainer.
chinese_title: Zigbook 剽窃 Zigtools 沙盒
chinese_summary:
Zigtools 指控 Zigbook 抄袭其定制的 Zigtools Playground，并敦促社区避开后者。Zigbook 最初因其“LLM 劣质内容”和可疑营销而受到批评，最近推出了一个“高压测试版”的 Playground 功能。

Zigtools 调查发现，Zigbook 的 WASM blob（zig.wasm, zls.wasm）与 Zigtools 自己的客户端 Playground 定制构建的逐字节完全相同。进一步分析揭示了复制的 JavaScript 代码，其中一些被 LLM 扭曲，但仍存在相同的片段。值得注意的是，Zigbook 复制了 ZLS WASM 二进制文件，但未能包含 ZLS 功能所需的关键 JavaScript API，这表明其缺乏理解。

尽管 Zigtools 的 Playground 采用 MIT 许可证，允许在注明出处的情况下复制，但 Zigbook 违反了这些条款，没有重现所需的版权和许可证声明。Zigtools 发出了一个中立的拉取请求来纠正此问题，但 Zigbook 迅速将其关闭并删除了描述。

这一事件促使 Zigtools 警告社区，推荐官方 Zig 资源，并将精力重新集中到增强其自身的 Playground 上（例如，多文件支持、DWARF 调试）。他们也正利用这个机会为 ZLS 的全职维护者筹集资金。

title: How good engineers write bad code at big companies
summary:
The article explores why competent engineers at large tech companies sometimes produce "bad" code, attributing it to systemic issues rather than individual incompetence.

The primary reason is the constant churn of engineers and frequent internal mobility. Big tech compensation packages often incentivize engineers to leave after 1-2 years, and internal re-organizations frequently move engineers to new teams or codebases. This means a high percentage of code changes are made by "beginners" — engineers new to the specific system, language, or even the company itself.

While "old hands" with deep expertise exist, their ability to mitigate this is limited. Companies make little effort to retain or formalize this expertise, and these experienced engineers are often overloaded, leading to rushed code reviews and insufficient involvement in decision-making.

The "median productive engineer" at a big tech company is therefore often working on unfamiliar code under tight deadlines, an environment not conducive to producing quality code. The author argues that big tech companies *deliberately* make this trade-off: they prioritize the ability to rapidly redeploy "fungible" engineers to "problem-of-the-month" projects (like AI pivots) over fostering deep, long-term expertise and pristine code quality. Bad code is a known, accepted consequence of this strategic flexibility.

Individual engineers are largely powerless to alter this dynamic. The article concludes that it's a mistake to blame engineers for "bad" code; the root cause is the company's organizational strategy that forces engineers to constantly work in unfamiliar codebases.
chinese_title: 大公司优秀工程师如何写烂代码
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了为何大型科技公司的合格工程师有时会产出“糟糕”的代码，并将其归因于系统性问题而非个人能力不足。

主要原因是工程师的持续流失和频繁的内部调动。大型科技公司的薪酬方案通常会激励工程师在1-2年后离职，而内部重组又经常将工程师调往新的团队或代码库。这意味着很大比例的代码更改是由“新手”完成的——这些工程师刚接触特定系统、语言，甚至刚入职公司。

尽管拥有深厚专业知识的“老手”确实存在，但他们缓解这种情况的能力有限。公司很少努力保留或规范这些专业知识，而这些经验丰富的工程师经常工作量过载，导致代码审查草率，并且对决策的参与不足。

因此，大型科技公司的“中位数高效工程师”常常在紧张的截止日期下处理不熟悉的代码，这种环境不利于产出高质量的代码。作者认为，大型科技公司是*故意*做出这种权衡的：他们优先考虑能够快速将“可替代的”工程师重新部署到“月度问题”项目（例如转向AI），而不是培养深厚的长期专业知识和无可挑剔的代码质量。糟糕的代码是这种战略灵活性的一个已知且被接受的后果。

个人工程师基本无力改变这种动态。文章总结认为，将“糟糕”的代码归咎于工程师是错误的；根本原因是公司的组织战略，该战略迫使工程师不断处理不熟悉的代码库。

title: Confessions of a Software Developer: No More Self-Censorship
summary:
In "Confessions of a Software Developer: No More Self-Censorship," Kerrick Long breaks a long silence, driven by fear, to openly admit professional shortcomings and personal truths. He aims to encourage others to embrace learning and confront their own knowledge gaps.

Long confesses that he didn't understand polymorphism for a decade, realizing he wrote "structured programs" despite working with object-oriented software, feeling hypocritical as a former hiring manager. He also admits to forgetting much of his SQL knowledge due to specialization, seeing it as a difficult sign of aging. His most impactful confession is shipping 95% of his code without automated tests, acknowledging the ethical concerns (citing Robert C. Martin) and fearing professional repercussions.

Personally, Long abandoned learning Blazor and C# after his company reversed a tech stack decision, losing intrinsic motivation. He expresses a deep desire to write more Ruby professionally, despite prioritizing good teammates over his preferred language, fearing his managers' disapproval. He recounts a severe cyberbullying incident, including doxing and harassment, after using an LLM for an open-source pull request without disclosure, which left him fearing professional damage and further attacks.

Regarding workplace observations, he argues that SaaS teams should adopt established development methodologies instead of custom processes. Controversially, he states that "remote work sucks" for collaborative software development due to reduced bandwidth and awareness, despite personally benefiting from a rural remote setup. He fears this stance could jeopardize his current and future remote job prospects. Liberated by these admissions, Long plans to continue skill-building and writing freely.
chinese_title: 程序员的忏悔录：不再自我审查
chinese_summary:
在《一个软件开发者的自白：不再自我审查》中，Kerrick Long 打破了因恐惧而保持的长期沉默，公开承认了职业短板和个人真相。他旨在鼓励他人拥抱学习，正视自身的知识盲区。

Long坦言，他十年来对多态性一知半解，意识到尽管从事面向对象软件开发，却一直在编写“结构化程序”，作为一名前招聘经理，他感到自己很虚伪。他还承认，由于专业化，他忘记了大部分SQL知识，认为这是衰老的一个艰难迹象。他最具影响力的自白是交付了95%没有自动化测试的代码，承认了伦理担忧（引用Robert C. Martin的话），并担心会产生职业影响。

个人方面，在公司改变技术栈决定后，Long放弃了学习Blazor和C#，失去了内在动力。他表达了在专业上多使用Ruby编程的强烈渴望，尽管他优先考虑优秀的队友而非偏好的语言，但仍担心管理层不悦。他还讲述了一起严重的网络欺凌事件，包括人肉搜索和骚扰，起因是他在未披露的情况下，使用LLM处理了一个开源拉取请求，这令他担忧职业受损和遭受进一步攻击。

关于职场观察，他认为SaaS团队应采用成熟的开发方法论，而非定制流程。他引起争议地表示，远程工作“很糟糕”，不利于协作式软件开发，原因在于带宽和意识的降低，尽管他个人受益于乡村远程工作环境。他担心这种立场可能会危及他当前和未来的远程工作机会。Long因这些自白而感到释然，并计划继续提升技能并自由创作。

title: Iceland declares ocean-current instability a national security risk
summary:
Iceland has declared the potential instability and collapse of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) a national security risk, marking the first time a climate impact has received this designation in the country. The AMOC is a vital system of ocean currents that transports warm water northward, significantly shaping Iceland's mild climate. Its collapse would lead to severe regional cooling, increased sea ice surrounding the island, and devastating impacts on infrastructure, transport, and key industries like fishing.

Scientists describe the AMOC, a "conveyor belt" of warm water, as crucial for global weather patterns. A growing body of research indicates it is slowing down due to rising global temperatures affecting heat and salinity. While the exact timing is uncertain, some studies project a collapse this century, with experts stating it's no longer a low-likelihood risk.

The global consequences of an AMOC shutdown would be catastrophic: rising sea levels in parts of the US and Europe, disrupted monsoon systems in Asia and Africa, and a deep winter freeze across Europe, with sea ice potentially extending to the UK.

Following alarming research, Iceland's Minister for Environment, Energy and Climate, Jóhann Páll Jóhannsson, spearheaded the national security designation. This move ensures a high-level, coordinated government response to prepare for and mitigate what he calls an "existential threat." Jóhannsson emphasized that it's a matter of national survival, as climate change might make adaptation impossible. Scientists have praised Iceland's decision, urging other nations to acknowledge the profound global implications.
chinese_title: 冰岛宣布洋流不稳定为国家安全风险
chinese_summary:
冰岛已宣布大西洋经向翻转环流（AMOC）的潜在不稳定性和崩溃为国家安全风险，这是该国首次将气候影响列为国家安全风险。AMOC是一个至关重要的洋流系统，它将暖水输送到北方，极大地塑造了冰岛温和的气候。其崩溃将导致严重的区域降温、岛屿周围海冰增加，并对基础设施、交通以及渔业等关键产业造成毁灭性影响。

科学家将AMOC这个“暖水输送带”描述为对全球天气模式至关重要。越来越多的研究表明，由于全球气温上升影响热量和盐度，AMOC正在减缓。虽然具体时间尚不确定，但一些研究预测其可能在本世纪崩溃，专家们表示这不再是低可能性风险。

AMOC停止运行的全球后果将是灾难性的：美国和欧洲部分地区海平面上升，亚洲和非洲季风系统中断，欧洲将经历严寒的冬季，海冰可能延伸至英国。

在令人担忧的研究之后，冰岛环境、能源和气候部长约翰·保罗·约翰逊（Jóhann Páll Jóhannsson）主导了这一国家安全风险的认定。此举确保了政府将采取高级别、协调一致的应对措施，以准备并缓解他所称的“生存威胁”。约翰逊强调，这是一个关乎国家存亡的问题，因为气候变化可能使得适应变得不可能。科学家们赞扬了冰岛的决定，并敦促其他国家认识到其深远的全球影响。

title: Be Like Clippy
summary:
The "Be Like Clippy" movement advocates for a fundamental shift in how companies handle user data and approach technology. It harks back to the Microsoft Office assistant, Clippy, arguing that it was a helpful tool that didn't exploit, sell, or hold user data hostage.

The movement highlights prevalent issues with current trillion-dollar companies, including data exploitation, data being held for ransom, its use in training AI models without explicit consent, and the problematic industry standard of opt-outs for data collection instead of opt-ins.

"Be Like Clippy" serves as a call to action for users to voice their discontent by setting their profile pictures to Clippy. It also implores developers and companies to embrace a more open, transparent, and user-friendly approach to technology, prioritizing user benefit and privacy over data monetization. A linked video further explains the movement's goals and objectives.
chinese_title: 学习Clippy
chinese_summary:

该运动强调了当前万亿美元公司普遍存在的问题，包括数据剥削、数据被勒索、未经明确同意将其用于训练AI模型，以及数据收集行业中“默认选择退出”（opt-out）而非“默认选择加入”（opt-in）这一有缺陷的行业标准。

“像Clippy一样”运动呼吁用户将头像设为Clippy来表达不满。它还敦促开发者和公司对技术采取更开放、透明、用户友好的态度，优先考虑用户利益和隐私，而非数据货币化。一个相关视频进一步阐释了该运动的目标和宗旨。

title: System 7 natively boots on the Mac mini G4
summary:
The article announces a notable achievement in retro computing: System 7 has been successfully booted natively on a Mac mini G4. This news originates from a forum post by user "fergycool" on "Mac OS 9 Lives," a community dedicated to Mac OS 9 and hardware hacks, specifically under the "Mac OS 9 on Unsupported Hardware" section.

The successful native boot of System 7 on a Mac mini G4 is a significant technical feat, as the G4 mini was released much later than System 7 and was never officially designed to run such an old operating system. This development showcases the ongoing efforts of the retro Macintosh community to push the boundaries of compatibility and explore unique hardware and software combinations, allowing legacy operating systems to run on more modern, albeit still vintage, hardware. The forum itself is active, featuring discussions on various retro Mac topics, including running Mac OS 9 on unsupported hardware like the Mac mini G4.

title: Meshtastic
summary:
Meshtastic offers a system for decentralized messaging, outlining a clear three-step process to get started. First, users choose a Meshtastic device from various available configurations to suit their needs. Second, the selected device must be flashed with the latest Meshtastic firmware and then configured. Finally, users connect to their device via one of the available clients to begin sending and receiving messages.

To connect and control Meshtastic devices, a variety of platforms are supported, allowing users to choose the client that best fits their ecosystem. These include:
*   An **iOS App** for managing the network on-the-go.
*   An **Android App** for connecting and controlling devices.
*   A **Web Client** for universal access from any device.
*   A **Python CLI/SDK** tailored for developers and power users requiring command-line interface or software development kit capabilities.

title: It's Always the Process, Stupid
summary:
The article "It's Always the Process, Stupid" contends that AI cannot fix fundamentally flawed business processes; it will only accelerate the generation of errors. The author argues that there is no distinct "AI strategy," only Business Process Optimization (BPO), as AI is merely a tool for speed, not inherent intelligence.

While AI's unique strength is handling unstructured data (emails, PDFs), this capability highlights a critical enterprise problem: processes relying on such data are often unstructured, undocumented, and exist primarily in employees' heads. Before AI can be effectively utilized, these "hidden" workflows must be brought into the light and rigorously defined—identifying triggers, transformations AI performs, and structured outputs.

The piece emphasizes that AI provides speed through pattern matching, but human intelligence and governance remain essential for defining context and nuance. Businesses should prioritize mapping and streamlining their value chains, especially the messy, human-centric parts. Only after establishing a robust, logical process should AI be applied to accelerate operations. The author suggests that a "Great IT-Divide" might explain why current AI tools often overlook this crucial BPO perspective.
chinese_title: 永远是过程，笨蛋！
chinese_summary:
文章《笨蛋，问题总出在流程上》认为，人工智能无法修复有根本缺陷的业务流程；它只会加速错误的产生。作者认为，没有独立的“AI战略”，只有业务流程优化（BPO），因为人工智能仅仅是一个提速的工具，而非固有的智能。

虽然人工智能的独特优势在于处理非结构化数据（如电子邮件、PDF文件），但这一能力也凸显了一个关键的企业问题：依赖此类数据的流程通常是非结构化的、没有文档记录的，并且主要存在于员工的头脑中。在人工智能能被有效利用之前，这些“隐藏的”工作流程必须被揭示出来并严谨定义——明确触发点、人工智能执行的转换以及结构化的输出。

文章强调，人工智能通过模式匹配提供速度，但人类的智能和治理对于定义上下文和细微差别仍然至关重要。企业应优先绘制并简化其价值链，尤其是那些混乱的、以人为中心的部分。只有在建立起一个健壮、逻辑清晰的流程之后，才应该应用人工智能来加速操作。作者认为，“巨大的IT鸿沟”或许能解释为什么当前的人工智能工具经常忽视这个关键的BPO视角。

title: Landlock-Ing Linux
summary:
Landlock is a Linux API introduced in kernel 5.13, designed to allow applications to explicitly declare and restrict the resources they can access. Operating as an unprivileged Linux Security Module (LSM), its philosophy mirrors OpenBSD's `unveil()` and `pledge()`, enabling programs to contract with the kernel to only access specified files or resources, denying everything else. This provides defense-in-depth, making sandboxing significantly easier for developers compared to traditional Linux security mechanisms.

Policies are created dynamically at runtime, consisting of "handled accesses" (e.g., filesystem read/write) and "access grants" (an allowlist of objects permitted for those operations). Once `landlock_restrict_self()` is called, restrictions are permanently enforced on the current thread and its descendants, unable to be revoked, though they can be further reduced through layering. It's stackable with other LSMs like SELinux.

Landlock excels when an application needs predictable file access, such as a web server confined to `/var/www/html`. Unlike SELinux or AppArmor, it requires no administrator involvement or system-wide configuration, embedding policies directly into application code. This addresses shortcomings of existing Linux sandboxing tools like cumbersome containers, overly broad Flatpak/Snap permissions, complex seccomp, or difficult SELinux/AppArmor profiles.

It promises to enhance security for long-running daemons, desktop applications like PDF readers and web browsers by restricting file access to only what's opened, and FTP/HTTP servers. Future developments include a "Supervise Mode" for interactive permission prompts (similar to Android), fine-grained socket restrictions, and improved inheritance controls, paving the way for a more secure Linux desktop experience. Landlock offers a simple, unprivileged, deny-by-default sandboxing solution with immense potential for application and desktop security.
chinese_title: 兰德洛克化 Linux
chinese_summary:
Landlock 是 Linux 内核 5.13 中引入的一个 API，旨在允许应用程序明确声明并限制其可访问的资源。Landlock 作为一个非特权的 Linux 安全模块 (LSM) 运行，其理念与 OpenBSD 的 `unveil()` 和 `pledge()` 相似，使程序能与内核约定只访问指定文件或资源，拒绝其他所有访问。这提供了深度防御，与传统 Linux 安全机制相比，显著简化了开发人员的沙盒化工作。

策略在运行时动态创建，包含“处理的访问”（例如文件系统读/写）和“访问授权”（针对这些操作允许的对象白名单）。一旦调用 `landlock_restrict_self()`，限制将永久强制应用于当前线程及其后代，无法撤销，但可以通过分层进一步收紧。Landlock 可与 SELinux 等其他 LSM 叠加使用。

当应用程序需要可预测的文件访问时，Landlock 表现出色，例如将 Web 服务器限制在 `/var/www/html` 目录中。与 SELinux 或 AppArmor 不同，它无需管理员干预或全系统配置，而是将策略直接嵌入到应用程序代码中。这解决了现有 Linux 沙盒工具的不足，如笨重的容器、过于宽泛的 Flatpak/Snap 权限、复杂的 seccomp 或难以配置的 SELinux/AppArmor 配置文件。

它有望增强长期运行的守护进程、PDF 阅读器和网络浏览器等桌面应用程序以及 FTP/HTTP 服务器的安全性，通过将文件访问限制为仅限已打开的文件。未来的发展包括用于交互式权限提示的“监督模式”（类似于 Android）、细粒度套接字限制以及改进的继承控制，为更安全的 Linux 桌面体验铺平道路。Landlock 提供了一个简单、非特权、默认拒绝的沙盒解决方案，对应用程序和桌面安全具有巨大潜力。

title: Learning Feynman's Trick for Integrals
summary:
Feynman's Trick, also known as Differentiation under the Integral Sign or the Leibniz Integral Rule, is a powerful technique for evaluating challenging integrals. While the method dates back to Leibniz, it was popularized by Richard Feynman, who discovered it in an advanced calculus book and found it an invaluable, often overlooked tool that gave him a unique edge in solving complex problems.

The core idea involves introducing a parameter, \(t\), into a difficult integral \(I = \int_a^b f(x) dx\), transforming it into a parameterized function \(I(t) = \int_a^b g(x,t) dx\). The integral is then differentiated with respect to this parameter: \(\frac{d}{dt} \int_a^b f(x, t)dx = \int_a^b \frac{\partial f(x, t)}{\partial t}dx\). The goal is for this differentiated integral, \(I'(t)\), to be much simpler to evaluate. After finding \(I'(t)\), the original integral \(I\) is recovered by integrating \(I'(t)\) back with respect to \(t\), typically using known boundary conditions for \(I(t)\).

The primary challenge lies in intelligently parameterizing the integral. A key rule of thumb is to place the parameter strategically so that differentiating with respect to it simplifies or eliminates a troublesome part of the integrand that is otherwise unrelated to the parameter. For example, in \(\int_0^1 \frac{x-1}{\ln x}dx\), parameterizing as \(I(t)=\int_0^1 \frac{x^t-1}{\ln x}dx\) removes the logarithm from the denominator upon differentiation. The article stresses that mastery comes through practice and creative problem-solving, as there's no universal formula for parameterization.
chinese_title: 学习费曼的积分窍门
chinese_summary:
费曼积分法，又称积分号下微分法或莱布尼茨积分法则，是一种求解复杂积分的强大技术。尽管该方法可追溯到莱布尼茨，但它由理查德·费曼推广开来。费曼在一本高等微积分书中发现了它，并认为它是一个宝贵的、常被忽视的工具，使他在解决复杂问题时拥有独特的优势。

其核心思想是将参数 \(t\) 引入一个困难的积分 \(I = \int_a^b f(x) dx\)，将其转化为参数化函数 \(I(t) = \int_a^b g(x,t) dx\)。随后，对该积分关于此参数进行微分：\(\frac{d}{dt} \int_a^b f(x, t)dx = \int_a^b \frac{\partial f(x, t)}{\partial t}dx\)。目标是让这个微分后的积分 \(I'(t)\) 更容易计算。找到 \(I'(t)\) 后，通过将 \(I'(t)\) 对 \(t\) 积分回去来恢复原始积分 \(I\)，通常会利用 \(I(t)\) 的已知边界条件。

主要挑战在于巧妙地对积分进行参数化。一个关键的经验法则是策略性地放置参数，以便对其进行微分时能简化或消除被积函数中与该参数无关的棘手部分。例如，在 \(\int_0^1 \frac{x-1}{\ln x}dx\) 中，将其参数化为 \(I(t)=\int_0^1 \frac{x^t-1}{\ln x}dx\) 可以在微分后消除分母中的对数项。文章强调，掌握这项技术需要通过实践和创造性解决问题，因为没有通用的参数化公式。

title: Norway wealth fund to vote for human rights report at Microsoft, against Nadella
summary:
Norway's $2 trillion wealth fund announced it will vote in favor of a shareholder proposal at Microsoft's upcoming Annual General Meeting (AGM) on December 5. This proposal calls for a report on the risks of operating in countries with significant human rights concerns, a motion that Microsoft management has recommended shareholders vote against.

Additionally, the fund stated its intention to vote against the re-appointment of CEO Satya Nadella as chair of the board, as well as opposing his pay package. The Norwegian fund holds a significant 1.35% stake in Microsoft, valued at $50 billion as of June 30, making it the company's eighth-largest shareholder and the fund's second-largest equity holding overall.

title: Every mathematician has only a few tricks (2020)
summary:
The article discusses Gian-Carlo Rota's assertion that "Every mathematician has only a few tricks" and seeks examples of these recurring techniques. Mathematicians shared various fundamental "tricks" they use repeatedly:

1.  **Changing the order of summation/integration:** This is a highly valued technique (Fubini's theorem) and its more general form, often leading to profound insights.
2.  **Simplification and Generalization:** A common strategy involves either simplifying a problem to make it solvable or, conversely, generalizing it to reveal underlying structure. This includes ideas like Polya's "make it simpler" and Hilbert's emphasis on solving easier problems first.
3.  **Adding Parameters:** Especially in combinatorics, introducing more parameters can unify diverse problems and lead to significant breakthroughs (e.g., Macdonald polynomials).
4.  **Triangle Inequality:** Despite its simplicity, its profound applications in various fields are highlighted through anecdotes like Dennis Sullivan's joke about Mikhail Gromov.
5.  **Integration by Parts:** This calculus technique is cited as surprisingly powerful and foundational, even leading to significant mathematical achievements.
6.  **Pigeonhole Principle:** Framed in terms of maximums and averages (e.g., "maximum is at least the average"), it's a powerful tool for existence proofs.
7.  **Probabilistic Method:** Attributed to Erdős, this involves constructing a random object and proving a desired property holds with positive probability.
8.  **Möbius μ-function:** Recommended as a more elegant way to handle inclusion–exclusion problems.
9.  **Integer-valued continuous functions are constant:** A basic topological principle with applications in various proofs.

The responses collectively suggest that while the "tricks" may seem simple, their strategic application is what distinguishes a mathematician's craft.
chinese_title: 每个数学家只有几个诀窍 (2020)
chinese_summary:
本文讨论了Gian-Carlo Rota“每位数学家都只掌握少数几个诀窍”的论断，并寻求这些反复使用的技巧的例子。数学家们分享了他们反复使用的各种基本“诀窍”：

1.  **改变求和/积分的顺序：** 这是一种备受推崇的技巧（富比尼定理）及其更一般的形式，常常能带来深刻的见解。
2.  **简化与推广：** 一种常见的策略是简化问题使其可解，或者，反过来，将其推广以揭示其内在结构。这包括波利亚（Polya）的“使它更简单”以及希尔伯特（Hilbert）强调先解决简单问题等思想。
3.  **添加参数：** 尤其在组合学中，引入更多参数可以统一不同的问题并带来重大突破（例如，麦克唐纳多项式）。
4.  **三角不等式：** 尽管它很简单，其在各个领域的深刻应用通过丹尼斯·沙利文（Dennis Sullivan）关于米哈伊尔·格罗莫夫（Mikhail Gromov）的笑话等轶事得到强调。
5.  **分部积分法：** 这种微积分技巧被认为是惊人的强大和基础，甚至导致了重大的数学成就。
6.  **抽屉原理：** 以最大值和平均值的角度来阐述（例如，“最大值至少等于平均值”），它是存在性证明的强大工具。
7.  **概率方法：** 归因于埃尔德什（Erdős），这涉及到构造一个随机对象，并证明所需的性质以正概率成立。
8.  **莫比乌斯μ函数：** 被推荐为处理容斥原理问题的一种更优雅的方法。
9.  **整数值连续函数是常数：** 一个基本的拓扑原理，在各种证明中都有应用。

这些回复共同表明，尽管这些“诀窍”可能看起来很简单，但它们的战略性应用才是数学家技艺的精髓所在。

title: Windows drive letters are not limited to A-Z
summary:
Windows drive letters are not limited to A-Z; symbols like `+:` and non-ASCII characters like `€:` can be assigned as drives, as demonstrated by the `subst` tool. This functionality is rooted in how Windows processes paths internally. High-level Win32 paths (e.g., `C:\foo`) are converted to NT namespace paths (e.g., `\??\C:\foo`) by APIs like `CreateFileW`.

Within the NT Object Manager, `\??` is a virtual folder where objects like `C:` exist as symbolic links pointing to physical device paths. Thus, a drive letter is essentially any character `X` for which `RtlDosPathNameToNtPathName_U` converts `X:\foo` into `\??\X:\foo`. This explains why `+:` and `€:` work as drive letters in `cmd.exe`.

Despite this underlying flexibility, several limitations exist:
1.  **File Explorer and PowerShell** do not recognize or allow navigation to non-A-Z drive letters.
2.  Drive letters are restricted to a single WTF-16 code unit (up to U+FFFF). Characters beyond this range (e.g., `𤭢:`) will not be correctly interpreted as drive-absolute paths by `RtlDosPathNameToNtPathName_U`, rendering them unusable.
3.  Non-system path APIs (like Rust's `Path::is_absolute`) often only recognize traditional A-Z drive letters.
4.  The `SetVolumeMountPointW` API exhibits a peculiar bug, truncating non-ASCII drive letters (e.g., `€:` becomes `¬:` due to truncation of its Unicode code point).

This reveals that while the core Windows path resolution is flexible, high-level applications and some APIs enforce stricter, A-Z conventions.
chinese_title: Windows 驱动器盘符不限于 A-Z
chinese_summary:
Windows 驱动器盘符不限于 A-Z；符号（如 `+:`）和非 ASCII 字符（如 `€:`）也可以被指定为驱动器，这已由 `subst` 工具所演示。此功能植根于 Windows 内部处理路径的方式。像 `CreateFileW` 这样的 API 会将高级 Win32 路径（例如 `C:\foo`）转换为 NT 命名空间路径（例如 `\??\C:\foo`）。

在 NT 对象管理器中，`\??` 是一个虚拟文件夹，其中像 `C:` 这样的对象以指向物理设备路径的符号链接形式存在。因此，驱动器盘符本质上是任何字符 `X`，只要 `RtlDosPathNameToNtPathName_U` 能将 `X:\foo` 转换为 `\??\X:\foo`。这解释了为何 `+:` 和 `€:` 在 `cmd.exe` 中可以作为驱动器盘符使用。

尽管有这种底层的灵活性，但仍存在一些限制：
1.  **文件资源管理器和 PowerShell** 不识别非 A-Z 的驱动器盘符，也不允许导航到这些盘符。
2.  驱动器盘符被限制为单个 WTF-16 码元（最高 U+FFFF）。超出此范围的字符（例如 `𤭢:`）将不会被 `RtlDosPathNameToNtPathName_U` 正确解析为驱动器绝对路径，从而无法使用。
3.  非系统路径 API（例如 Rust 的 `Path::is_absolute`）通常只识别传统的 A-Z 驱动器盘符。
4.  `SetVolumeMountPointW` API 存在一个奇怪的错误，它会截断非 ASCII 驱动器盘符（例如，`€:` 会因其 Unicode 码点被截断而变为 `¬:`）。

这表明，尽管 Windows 核心路径解析是灵活的，但高级应用程序和某些 API 却强制执行更严格的 A-Z 约定。

title: Flight disruption warning as Airbus requests modifications to 6k planes
summary:
Airbus has issued a flight disruption warning, necessitating immediate software updates for over 6,000 planes, primarily its A320 model. The aerospace giant discovered that onboard computers are vulnerable to intense solar radiation, which can corrupt data critical for controlling aircraft elevation. This vulnerability came to light in October when a JetBlue flight from Mexico experienced a "sudden drop in altitude," attributed to solar interference.

The required modifications are causing mass cancellations, notably affecting a major US holiday weekend. Four of the biggest A320 operators in the US – American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, JetBlue, and United Airlines – are heavily impacted. While UK airports have experienced limited disruption, other airlines worldwide have reported cancellations.

所需的修改导致了大规模航班取消，尤其影响了一个重要的美国假日周末。美国四大A320主要运营商——美国航空、达美航空、捷蓝航空和联合航空——受到严重影响。虽然英国机场受到的影响有限，但全球其他航空公司也报告了航班取消。

title: Major AI conference flooded with peer reviews written by AI
summary:
A recent analysis by Pangram Labs revealed that a significant portion of peer reviews for the International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR) 2026 were generated by artificial intelligence. Academics, including Graham Neubig, suspected AI involvement in reviews due to their verbose nature, unusual requests, and even hallucinated citations.

Neubig enlisted Pangram Labs, an AI-detection company, to scan all 19,490 submitted studies and 75,800 peer reviews. Their findings were striking: approximately 21% of the peer reviews were fully AI-generated, and over half contained signs of AI use. Additionally, 1% of the manuscripts submitted were entirely AI-generated, with 9% containing more than 50% AI-generated text.

This analysis confirmed suspicions for many researchers, such as Desmond Elliott, who received low ratings from suspected AI reviews that seemed to misunderstand his paper. The ICLR organizers acknowledge this unprecedented issue and plan to implement automated tools to assess submissions and reviews against AI usage policies, aiming to restore trust in the peer review process. This incident underscores the growing challenges AI poses to academic integrity and the fairness of scientific evaluation.
chinese_title: 大型AI会议充斥AI生成的同行评审。
chinese_summary:

Neubig委托了人工智能检测公司Pangram Labs，扫描了所有19,490份提交的研究和75,800份同行评审。他们的发现令人震惊：大约21%的同行评审完全由人工智能生成，超过一半含有使用人工智能的迹象。此外，1%的提交手稿完全由人工智能生成，9%的手稿含有超过50%的人工智能生成文本。

这项分析证实了许多研究人员的怀疑，例如Desmond Elliott，他收到了疑似人工智能评审的低分，这些评审似乎误解了他的论文。ICLR组织者承认这个前所未有的问题，并计划实施自动化工具，根据人工智能使用政策来评估提交的论文和评审，旨在恢复对同行评审过程的信任。这一事件凸显了人工智能对学术诚信和科学评估公平性构成的日益严峻的挑战。

title: CachyOS: Fast and Customizable Linux Distribution
summary:
CachyOS is a blazingly fast and highly customizable Linux distribution built on Arch Linux, designed for optimal speed, stability, and security. It targets users seeking a powerful and efficient operating system.

Key features include its optimized `linux-cachyos` kernel, utilizing the advanced BORE Scheduler for unparalleled performance and interactivity, with other scheduler options like EEVDF and RT also available. Performance is further boosted by compiling packages with advanced instruction sets (x86-64-v3, x86-64-v4, Zen4) and LTO, with core packages receiving PGO or BOLT optimization.

CachyOS offers extensive customization during installation, allowing users to choose from a wide array of Desktop Environments, Wayland Compositors, and X11 Window Managers, including KDE Plasma, GNOME, XFCE, i3, Hyprland, and Sway. Installation itself is flexible, with options for both a user-friendly GUI (Calamares) and a streamlined CLI.

The distribution emphasizes robust kernel support, optimized for various CPUs. CachyOS invites users to download and experience its lightning-fast performance, and encourages donations to support its open-source development.

title: The CRDT Dictionary: A Field Guide to Conflict-Free Replicated Data Types
summary:
The article serves as a field guide to Conflict-free Replicated Data Types (CRDTs), data structures that enable deterministic merging of concurrent writes across distributed nodes without coordination or data loss. Originating from the author's interest in Riak around 2014, CRDTs solve the problem of achieving eventual consistency where consensus (e.g., Paxos/Raft) might hinder availability or Last-Write-Wins leads to data loss.

The core principle is that a CRDT's merge operation must be **commutative, associative, and idempotent**, ensuring that replicas converge to the same state regardless of merge order or duplicates. This often relies on the concept of a **lattice**, where data states form a partial order, and updates only move "upward" (monotonicity), allowing the merge operation to be a "join" (least upper bound).

CRDTs are broadly categorized into state-based (CvRDTs), which send entire states, and operation-based (CmRDTs), which send operations. The guide focuses on state-based types:

*   **G-Counter (Grow-Only Counter)**: Each replica stores its own count; merging takes the `max` of each replica's count. Supports only increments.
*   **PN-Counter (Positive-Negative Counter)**: Extends G-Counter by maintaining two G-Counters (for increments and decrements) to allow both operations.
*   **G-Set (Grow-Only Set)**: A set that only supports additions; merge uses set `union`. Elements cannot be removed.
*   **2P-Set (Two-Phase Set)**: Uses two G-Sets (added and removed). An element is present if in `added` but not `removed`. Once removed, an element cannot be re-added.
*   **LWW-Element-Set (Last-Write-Wins Element Set)**: Associates each element's add/remove operations with timestamps. An element is present if its latest timestamped operation was an add, allowing re-addition.

CRDTs are valuable for applications needing high availability and resilience to network partitions, like offline-first apps, by designing data structures where conflicts resolve automatically.
chinese_title: CRDT 词典：无冲突复制数据类型实地指南
chinese_summary:
本文是一份关于无冲突复制数据类型 (CRDTs) 的实用指南，这种数据结构能够在分布式节点间，无需协调地、确定性地合并并发写入，且不会造成数据丢失。CRDTs 起源于作者在2014年左右对 Riak 的兴趣，它解决了在共识算法（如 Paxos/Raft）可能阻碍可用性，或“最后写入者获胜”（Last-Write-Wins）可能导致数据丢失的情况下，实现最终一致性的问题。

核心原则是 CRDT 的合并操作必须满足**交换律、结合律和幂等性**，以确保无论合并顺序如何或是否存在重复操作，所有副本都能收敛到相同的状态。这通常依赖于**格**的概念，其中数据状态形成一个偏序关系，更新只向上“移动”（单调性），从而使合并操作成为一个“并”（最小上界）。

CRDTs 大致分为基于状态的 (CvRDTs) 和基于操作的 (CmRDTs) 两种，前者发送整个状态，后者发送操作。本指南主要关注基于状态的类型：

*   **G-Counter (只增计数器)**：每个副本存储自己的计数；合并时取每个副本计数的 `max` 值。只支持增量操作。
*   **PN-Counter (正负计数器)**：通过维护两个 G-Counter（分别用于增量和减量）来扩展 G-Counter，从而允许两种操作。
*   **G-Set (只增集合)**：只支持添加元素的集合；合并使用集合 `union`（并集）。元素不能被移除。
*   **2P-Set (两阶段集合)**：使用两个 G-Set（已添加和已移除）。如果一个元素在 `added` 集合中但不在 `removed` 集合中，则该元素存在。一旦被移除，元素不能再次添加。
*   **LWW-Element-Set (最后写入者获胜元素集合)**：将每个元素的添加/移除操作与时间戳关联起来。如果元素的最新时间戳操作是添加，则该元素存在，从而允许重新添加。

通过设计冲突能自动解决的数据结构，CRDTs 对于需要高可用性和网络分区容忍能力的应用（如离线优先应用）非常有价值。

title: We're learning more about what Vitamin D does
summary:
The article explores the "sunshine vitamin," vitamin D, highlighting its widespread deficiency, particularly in winter and northern latitudes. Traditionally known for its crucial role in bone health by aiding calcium absorption and preventing rickets, recent research suggests broader implications for our bodies.

New insights link vitamin D deficiency to conditions like high blood pressure, where supplements may help, and an increased risk of cardiovascular events, although evidence for supplement efficacy here is mixed. Vitamin D also appears to influence immune health, with links found to the common cold and gene expression related to immune function; however, its ability to prevent acute respiratory infections through supplementation is not strongly supported. Further studies hint at connections to mental health, pregnancy outcomes, and cancer survival.

Despite these "tantalizing" potential benefits, the evidence for vitamin D supplementation in many of these areas remains mixed or inconclusive. Challenges for researchers include the difficulty of randomized trials, varying individual responses to sunlight (the primary source), and disagreement on "ideal" blood levels of 25-hydroxycholecalciferol. While there is consensus on defining deficiency (below 30 nmol/L), determining precise supplementation needs is complex. The author concludes by emphasizing the importance of avoiding deficiency, citing the UK government's advice for a 10-microgram supplement during autumn and winter.
chinese_title: 我们正在了解更多维生素D的作用。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了“阳光维生素”——维生素D，指出其广泛存在的缺乏现象，尤其是在冬季和北纬地区。传统上，维生素D因通过帮助钙吸收和预防佝偻病而在骨骼健康中发挥关键作用而闻名，但近期研究表明它对人体有更广泛的影响。

新的见解将维生素D缺乏与高血压等疾病联系起来（补充剂可能对此有所帮助），以及心血管事件风险增加（尽管补充剂在这方面的有效性证据喜忧参半）。维生素D似乎也影响免疫健康，已发现其与普通感冒和免疫功能相关的基因表达有关；然而，通过补充剂预防急性呼吸道感染的能力并未得到强有力支持。进一步的研究还暗示了其与心理健康、妊娠结局和癌症生存率之间可能存在的联系。

尽管有这些“诱人”的潜在益处，但在许多这些领域中，维生素D补充剂的证据仍然喜忧参半或不确定。研究人员面临的挑战包括随机试验的难度、个体对阳光（维生素D的主要来源）反应的差异，以及对25-羟基胆钙化醇“理想”血液水平的争议。尽管在定义缺乏症（低于30 nmol/L）方面存在共识，但确定精确的补充需求仍然复杂。作者最后强调了避免维生素D缺乏的重要性，并引用了英国政府关于在秋冬季节补充10微克维生素D的建议。

title: Belgian Police exposed using botnets to manipulate EU data law impact assessment

title: High air pollution could diminish exercise benefits by half – study
summary:
A new international study, analyzing health data from over 1.5 million adults across several countries, reveals that high air pollution can significantly diminish the health benefits of exercise.

The research focused on fine particulate matter (PM2.5), tiny particles known to cause inflammation and long-term damage. While regular moderate-to-vigorous exercise typically lowers the risk of death by 30%, this protective effect was more than halved in areas with a yearly average PM2.5 exceeding 25 μg/m³, reducing the benefit to just 12–15%. In regions with PM2.5 levels above 35 μg/m³, protection weakened even further, especially against cancer mortality.

Lead researchers Professor Po-Wen Ku and Professor Andrew Steptoe affirmed that exercise remains beneficial even in polluted environments, but emphasized that improving air quality can substantially enhance these health gains. They noted that toxic air can "block the benefits of exercise, although not eliminate them," highlighting the crucial interplay between clean air and physical activity for healthy aging.

The study, primarily based on data from high-income countries, underscores air pollution as a serious global health problem. Researchers advise checking air quality, choosing cleaner routes, or reducing exercise intensity on polluted days to maximize health benefits, rather than discouraging outdoor activity. Cleaner air and regular exercise are presented as interdependent factors vital for health.
chinese_title: 高空气污染或使运动益处减半——研究
chinese_summary:
一项新的国际研究分析了来自多个国家超过150万成年人的健康数据，揭示高空气污染能显著削弱运动带来的健康益处。

该研究聚焦于细颗粒物（PM2.5），这种微小颗粒已知会引起炎症和长期损害。尽管规律的从中等到剧烈运动通常能将死亡风险降低30%，但在年平均PM2.5超过25微克/立方米的地区，这种保护作用减少了一半以上，将益处降至仅12-15%。在PM2.5水平高于35微克/立方米的地区，保护作用进一步减弱，尤其是在对抗癌症死亡率方面。

主要研究人员Po-Wen Ku教授和Andrew Steptoe教授证实，即使在污染环境中运动仍有益处，但他们强调改善空气质量可以显著提升这些健康益处。他们指出，有毒空气“会阻碍运动的好处，但不会完全消除它们”，这突显了清洁空气和体育活动对于健康老龄化的关键相互作用。

这项研究主要基于高收入国家的数据，强调了空气污染是一个严重的全球健康问题。研究人员建议，在污染天气下，应检查空气质量、选择更清洁的路线或降低运动强度以最大化健康益处，而不是阻止户外活动。清洁空气和规律运动被认为是健康不可或缺的相互依存因素。

title: Garfield's Proof of the Pythagorean Theorem
summary:
James A. Garfield, the 20th U.S. President, developed an original proof of the Pythagorean theorem, published in the New-England Journal of Education in 1876, while he was a congressman. He remains the only U.S. President to have contributed original mathematics. The proof is considered "very clever" by historians and is included in a compendium of 370 proofs.

Garfield's proof involves constructing a trapezoid from a right-angled triangle. Starting with a right triangle ABC (sides a, b, hypotenuse c), he drew a line through B perpendicular to AB and chose point D such that BD = BA. From D, he dropped a perpendicular DE onto the extended line CB. This construction results in two congruent right triangles (ABC and BDE) and an isosceles right triangle (ABD). The overall figure ACED forms a trapezoid.

The proof proceeds by calculating the area of this trapezoid in two ways:
1.  Using the trapezoid area formula: The parallel sides are AC (length b) and DE (length a), and the height is CE (length a + b). So, Area = (1/2) * (b + a) * (a + b) = (1/2) * (a + b)^2.
2.  As the sum of the areas of the three constituent triangles:
    *   Area of ΔACB = (1/2)ab
    *   Area of ΔBDE = (1/2)ab (since it's congruent to ΔACB)
    *   Area of ΔABD = (1/2)c^2 (it's an isosceles right triangle with legs c)
    So, total Area = (1/2)ab + (1/2)ab + (1/2)c^2 = ab + (1/2)c^2.

Equating the two expressions for the trapezoid's area:
(1/2)(a + b)^2 = ab + (1/2)c^2
Multiplying by 2: (a + b)^2 = 2ab + c^2
Expanding: a^2 + 2ab + b^2 = 2ab + c^2
Subtracting 2ab from both sides yields the Pythagorean theorem: a^2 + b^2 = c^2.
chinese_title: 加菲尔德勾股定理证明
chinese_summary:
美国第20任总统詹姆斯·A·加菲尔德在担任国会议员期间，于1876年在《新英格兰教育杂志》上发表了他对勾股定理的一种原创证明。他仍然是唯一一位对数学做出原创贡献的美国总统。该证明被历史学家认为是“非常巧妙”的，并被收录在一本包含370种证明的汇编中。

加菲尔德的证明是通过从一个直角三角形构造一个梯形来完成的。以直角三角形ABC（直角边a、b，斜边c）为例，他画了一条过点B垂直于AB的直线，并选择点D，使BD = BA。从D点，他向CB的延长线作垂线DE。这种构造得到了两个全等的直角三角形（ABC和BDE）和一个等腰直角三角形（ABD）。整个图形ACED构成了一个梯形。

该证明通过两种方式计算这个梯形的面积：
1.  使用梯形面积公式：平行边是AC（长度b）和DE（长度a），高是CE（长度a + b）。因此，面积 = (1/2) * (b + a) * (a + b) = (1/2) * (a + b)^2。
2.  作为三个组成三角形的面积之和：
    *   ΔACB的面积 = (1/2)ab
    *   ΔBDE的面积 = (1/2)ab（因为它与ΔACB全等）
    *   ΔABD的面积 = (1/2)c^2（它是一个以c为直角边的等腰直角三角形）
    因此，总面积 = (1/2)ab + (1/2)ab + (1/2)c^2 = ab + (1/2)c^2。

将梯形的两种面积表达式等同起来：
(1/2)(a + b)^2 = ab + (1/2)c^2
两边乘以2： (a + b)^2 = 2ab + c^2
展开： a^2 + 2ab + b^2 = 2ab + c^2
两边同时减去2ab，就得到了勾股定理： a^2 + b^2 = c^2。

title: Migrating Dillo from GitHub
summary:
Rodrigo Arias Mallo is migrating the Dillo project from GitHub to a self-hosted server with multiple mirrors to address past issues and GitHub's limitations. The original dillo.org domain was lost in 2022, resulting in data loss, which the project aims to prevent by avoiding single points of failure.

GitHub is problematic because its frontend heavily relies on JavaScript, making it unusable with Dillo itself and resource-intensive. It's a single point of control, risking account bans and data loss. The platform has become slow, encourages a "push model" over the preferred "pull model" for offline work, and lacks adequate moderation tools. Additionally, GitHub's focus on LLMs leads to aggressive crawling and JavaScript walls, excluding Dillo users.

The new setup involves self-hosting on dillo-browser.org, using a small VPS. All important data is in git repositories. A lightweight, JavaScript-free git frontend, cgit, is used. A custom bug tracker, "buggy," stores bugs as Markdown files in a git repo, enabling offline work and preventing centralized data loss. Git mirrors are established on Codeberg and Sourcehut for redundancy.

While the dillo-browser.org DNS entry is still a single point of failure, OpenPGP signatures (using Rodrigo's GPG key) provide authority independent of DNS or TLS, enhancing resilience. The migration is ongoing; GitHub repositories will remain active until completion, then be archived to avoid breaking existing builds. The goal is an independent, low-cost, and sustainable project, with current donations projected to cover expenses for at least three years.
chinese_title: 从 GitHub 迁移 Dillo
chinese_summary:
罗德里戈·阿里亚斯·马洛（Rodrigo Arias Mallo）正在将Dillo项目从GitHub迁移到一个自托管服务器，并设置了多个镜像，以解决过去的问题和GitHub的局限性。原有的dillo.org域名在2022年丢失，导致数据丢失，该项目旨在通过避免单点故障来防止此类情况再次发生。

GitHub存在问题，因为其前端严重依赖JavaScript，这使得Dillo浏览器本身无法使用，并且资源消耗巨大。它是一个单一的控制点，存在账户封禁和数据丢失的风险。该平台已经变得缓慢，相对于离线工作首选的“拉取模式”（pull model），它更倾向于“推送模式”（push model），并且缺乏足够的审核工具。此外，GitHub对大型语言模型（LLMs）的关注导致了激进的抓取和JavaScript门槛，将Dillo用户排除在外。

新的设置包括在dillo-browser.org上进行自托管，使用一台小型VPS。所有重要数据都存储在Git仓库中。使用了轻量级、无JavaScript的Git前端cgit。一个名为“buggy”的自定义bug跟踪器将bug作为Markdown文件存储在Git仓库中，这使得离线工作成为可能，并防止了集中式数据丢失。在Codeberg和Sourcehut上建立了Git镜像以实现冗余。

虽然dillo-browser.org的DNS条目仍然是一个单点故障，但OpenPGP签名（使用罗德里戈的GPG密钥）提供了独立于DNS或TLS的权威性，增强了弹性。迁移正在进行中；GitHub仓库将保持活跃状态直至完成，然后将被存档，以避免破坏现有的构建。目标是建立一个独立、低成本、可持续的项目，目前的捐款预计至少可以覆盖三年的开销。

title: Europe's New War on Privacy
summary:
The EU is advancing "Chat Control," formally the Child Sexual Abuse Regulation, a plan to mass-scan private messages, despite widespread public and governmental resistance. Initially proposed in 2022, it was repeatedly blocked but persistently repackaged. A revised version, "Chat Control 2.0," was recently greenlit by Coreper, an opaque EU body, bypassing democratic debate and potentially leading to its adoption as early as December.

Critics, including cybersecurity academics and digital rights campaigners, argue this initiative is a dangerous blueprint for generalized surveillance, violating fundamental rights and potentially creating a "total surveillance machine." While removing mandatory general monitoring, the new text encourages "voluntary" mass scanning by online platforms, using AI to detect "grooming" behaviors. Experts warn that AI is incapable of reliably distinguishing innocent conversations from illicit activity, leading to massive false positives (50-80% of current reports are irrelevant) and exposing intimate communications.

Furthermore, the proposal requires providers to implement "risk mitigation measures," which could force encrypted services like WhatsApp and Signal to scan messages on users' devices before encryption, creating dangerous backdoors. This would compromise global cybersecurity and affect users worldwide. Another critical feature is mandatory age-verification for app stores and messaging services, which critics argue is technologically unworkable, reliant on invasive data, and would effectively end anonymous communication – a vital tool for journalists, whistleblowers, and activists.

Opponents highlight that mass scanning is ineffective against perpetrators using decentralized or encrypted methods and argue it shifts responsibility to opaque corporate algorithms. The EU Court of Justice has previously ruled against such general analysis of private communications. Instead of undermining privacy, critics advocate for targeted surveillance with judicial warrants and the preservation of end-to-end encryption and anonymity. They warn of "function creep," where temporary measures become permanent, leading to a comprehensive surveillance infrastructure ripe for misuse and political repression. The article concludes that Europe stands on the brink of building a pervasive surveillance system that will outlast current authorities.
chinese_title: 欧洲新隐私之战
chinese_summary:
欧盟正在推进“聊天控制”，其正式名称是《儿童性虐待监管条例》，这是一项大规模扫描私人信息的计划，尽管遭到广泛的公众和政府抵制。该计划最初于2022年提出，屡遭阻挠，但被持续重新包装。修订版“聊天控制2.0”最近获得欧盟一个不透明机构Coreper的批准，绕过了民主辩论，可能最早在12月获得通过。

包括网络安全学者和数字权利倡导者在内的批评人士认为，这项倡议是普遍监视的危险蓝图，侵犯了基本权利，并可能创建一个“全面监视机器”。虽然取消了强制性普遍监控，但新文本鼓励在线平台“自愿”进行大规模扫描，利用人工智能检测“诱骗”行为。专家警告称，人工智能无法可靠地区分无辜对话与非法活动，导致大量误报（目前50-80%的报告都是无关的）并暴露私密通信。

此外，该提案要求提供商实施“风险缓解措施”，这可能迫使WhatsApp和Signal等加密服务在消息加密前扫描用户设备上的消息，从而制造危险的后门。这将损害全球网络安全，并影响全球用户。另一个关键特征是应用商店和消息服务的强制年龄验证，批评者认为这在技术上不可行，依赖侵入性数据，并将有效终结匿名通信——而匿名通信对记者、举报人和活动家来说是至关重要的工具。

反对者强调，大规模扫描对使用去中心化或加密方法的犯罪者无效，并认为它将责任转移给不透明的企业算法。欧盟法院此前已裁定反对对私人通信进行此类普遍分析。批评者主张，与其损害隐私，不如通过司法授权进行有针对性的监视，并保留端到端加密和匿名性。他们警告“功能蔓延”，即临时措施变得永久化，导致形成一个全面的监控基础设施，易被滥用并用于政治压迫。文章最后指出，欧洲正处于建立一个将超越现有当局的无处不在的监控系统的边缘。

title: Testing shows automotive glassbreakers can't break modern automotive glass
summary:
The Core77 article, "Testing Shows Automotive Glassbreakers Can't Break Modern Automotive Glass," challenges the efficacy of consumer car escape tools, a market valued at $500 million. It argues that the industry's marketing relies on fear, depicting highly unlikely scenarios like being trapped in burning or sinking cars with jammed seatbelts.

According to NHTSA, accidents involving fire or water are less than 0.5% of all accidents, and seatbelt jamming is so rare it isn't tracked by safety organizations.

The central issue lies with glassbreakers: they are designed for *tempered glass*, previously common in side windows. However, modern safety regulations (2013 FMVSS 226 "Ejection Mitigation Rule") have led most manufacturers to adopt *laminated glass* for side windows, which is significantly tougher and prevents occupant ejection. An AAA study found that none of six common glassbreakers could penetrate laminated glass, with two even failing against tempered glass.

Major automakers like Acura, Audi, BMW, Ford, Honda, Toyota, and Volvo now predominantly use laminated side glass, rendering these consumer tools largely ineffective in modern vehicles, potentially useful only in classic cars. While seatbelt cutters are of limited use for general consumers, they remain invaluable tools for trained first responders to extricate unconscious accident victims.
chinese_title: 测试表明汽车破窗器无法击碎现代汽车玻璃
chinese_summary:
Core77文章，“测试表明汽车破窗器无法打破现代汽车玻璃”，质疑了价值5亿美元的消费级汽车逃生工具的有效性。文章指出，该行业的营销依赖于恐惧，描绘了极不可能发生的场景，例如被困在着火或正在下沉的汽车中，同时安全带卡住。

根据美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）的数据，涉及火灾或水灾的事故不到所有事故的0.5%，而安全带卡住的情况极为罕见，以至于安全组织不对其进行跟踪。

核心问题在于破窗器：它们是为*钢化玻璃*设计的，钢化玻璃以前常用于侧窗。然而，现代安全法规（2013年FMVSS 226“弹射缓解规则”）已促使大多数制造商在侧窗采用*夹层玻璃*，这种玻璃明显更坚韧，并能防止乘员被甩出。AAA的一项研究发现，六种常见的破窗器都无法穿透夹层玻璃，其中两种甚至对钢化玻璃也无效。

讴歌、奥迪、宝马、福特、本田、丰田和沃尔沃等主要汽车制造商现在主要使用夹层侧窗玻璃，这使得这些消费级工具在现代汽车中基本无效，可能只对老爷车有用。虽然安全带切割器对普通消费者用处有限，但它们仍然是训练有素的急救人员解救失去意识的事故受害者的宝贵工具。

title: Electric vehicle sales are booming in South America – without Tesla
summary:
Electric vehicle (EV) sales are rapidly expanding in South America, with a 38% increase in the first half of 2023 across the region's six largest markets, totaling over 36,000 units. This boom is largely driven by Chinese manufacturers like BYD, Chery, JAC, and Great Wall (GWM), which offer more affordable models compared to premium brands. European automakers such as Renault and Peugeot also contribute significantly.

Notably, Tesla holds a minimal presence in the region, as its current luxury-focused lineup and lack of smaller, more accessible vehicles are less suited to the South American market's needs. The growth is fueled by government incentives, including tax breaks and reduced import duties in countries like Brazil and Colombia.

A substantial portion of this electrification trend comes from hybrid-electric vehicles (HEVs), which account for two-thirds of electrified vehicle sales. Consumers often prefer HEVs as a transitional step due to concerns about charging infrastructure availability and EV range anxiety. Companies like GWM are investing in local production, with a Brazilian factory set to open in 2024 to manufacture both EVs and hybrids. While charging infrastructure remains a challenge, the market indicates robust growth for accessible electrified vehicles across South America.
chinese_title: 南美电动汽车销量井喷，特斯拉缺席
chinese_summary:
电动汽车（EV）销量在南美洲迅速增长，2023年上半年，该地区六大市场的销量增长了38%，总计超过36,000辆。这一热潮主要由比亚迪（BYD）、奇瑞（Chery）、江淮（JAC）和长城汽车（GWM）等中国制造商推动，它们提供的车型比高端品牌更经济实惠。雷诺和标致等欧洲汽车制造商也做出了重要贡献。

值得注意的是，特斯拉在该地区的存在感极低，因为其目前专注于豪华车型的产品线以及缺乏更小、更易购得的车辆，不太适合南美市场的需求。这种增长还得益于政府激励措施，包括巴西和哥伦比亚等国家的税收减免和进口关税降低。

这种电气化趋势的很大一部分来自混合动力汽车（HEV），其销量占电气化汽车总销量的三分之二。由于对充电基础设施可用性和电动汽车续航里程焦虑的担忧，消费者通常更倾向于将HEV作为过渡性选择。长城汽车等公司正在投资本地生产，其巴西工厂将于2024年投产，用于制造电动汽车和混合动力汽车。尽管充电基础设施仍然是一个挑战，但市场表明，南美洲经济实惠的电气化汽车将实现强劲增长。

title: Show HN: Nano PDF – A CLI Tool to Edit PDFs with Gemini's Nano Banana
summary:
Nano PDF is a Command Line Interface (CLI) tool that enables users to edit PDF slides using natural language prompts, leveraging Google's Gemini 3 Pro Image model, affectionately dubbed "Nano Banana."

Key features include:
*   **Natural Language Editing:** Users can issue commands like "Update the graph to include data from 2025" or "Change the chart to a bar graph."
*   **Add New Slides:** The tool can generate new slides that seamlessly match the existing deck's visual style.
*   **Non-Destructive Editing:** It preserves the PDF's searchable text layer through an OCR re-hydration process.
*   **Multi-page & Parallel Processing:** Edits can span multiple pages and are processed concurrently for efficiency.

The tool works by converting PDF pages to images, using optional style references, sending these images and prompts to Gemini 3 Pro Image for AI generation, restoring the searchable text via Tesseract OCR, and finally stitching the edited pages back into the PDF.

Installation is via `pip install nano-pdf`, and it requires system dependencies like Poppler and Tesseract. Crucially, a paid Google Gemini API key with billing enabled is necessary, as Gemini 3 Pro Image is not available on the free tier.

Usage involves commands like `nano-pdf edit my_deck.pdf 2 "Change the title"` for editing existing pages, and `nano-pdf add my_deck.pdf 0 "Title slide"` for inserting new, AI-generated slides. Options allow specifying resolution, output filename, style reference pages, and enabling/disabling full document context or Google Search for the AI. The project is open-sourced under the MIT License.

title: A first look at Django's new background tasks
summary:
Django 6.0 introduces `django.tasks`, a built-in framework for background tasks. Its primary goal is to offer a common API for task queue implementations, rather than being a full-blown solution like Celery. A key distinction is that Django handles task creation and queuing, but **does not provide a worker mechanism**; execution must be managed by external infrastructure.

Tasks are defined using the `@task` decorator and must be invoked via `task_instance.enqueue()`, preventing accidental in-process execution. The framework allows specifying priority, queue, and backend, and offers context access for task results. Out-of-the-box, Django 6.0 includes `ImmediateBackend` (executes instantly) and `DummyBackend` (does nothing).

The article demonstrates creating a custom `DatabaseBackend` and worker for true background processing. This backend uses Django models (`Task`, `Error`, `Attempt`) to store task state, execution attempts, and errors. It supports configurable retries (`max_attempts`) and exponential backoff (`backoff_factor`) at a global or per-queue level.

The `QueueStore` within the backend handles task lifecycle, including enqueueing, result retrieval, and robustly claiming tasks transactionally to prevent concurrent processing by multiple workers. A `Worker` class utilizes this `QueueStore` to identify, claim, and process available tasks, recording their status, return values, and any errors encountered during execution. This modular approach allows integration with various external execution environments.
chinese_title: Django 新后台任务初探
chinese_summary:
Django 6.0 引入了 `django.tasks`，这是一个内置的后台任务框架。其主要目标是为任务队列实现提供一个通用 API，而非像 Celery 那样是一个功能完备的解决方案。一个关键区别在于，Django 负责任务的创建和入队，但**不提供工作进程机制**；任务的执行必须由外部基础设施来管理。

任务使用 `@task` 装饰器定义，并且必须通过 `task_instance.enqueue()` 调用，以防止意外地在进程内执行。该框架允许指定优先级、队列和后端，并提供对任务结果的上下文访问。开箱即用，Django 6.0 包含 `ImmediateBackend`（立即执行）和 `DummyBackend`（不执行任何操作）。

本文演示了如何创建一个自定义的 `DatabaseBackend` 和工作进程，以实现真正的后台处理。此后端使用 Django 模型（`Task`、`Error`、`Attempt`）来存储任务状态、执行尝试和错误。它支持全局或按队列级别配置的重试次数（`max_attempts`）和指数退避（`backoff_factor`）。

后端中的 `QueueStore` 处理任务生命周期，包括入队、结果检索，以及以事务方式健壮地声明任务，以防止多个工作进程并发处理。`Worker` 类利用此 `QueueStore` 来识别、声明和处理可用任务，记录它们的状体、返回值以及执行过程中遇到的任何错误。这种模块化的方法允许与各种外部执行环境集成。

title: Framework Computer Now Sponsoring LVFS / Fwupd Development
summary:
Framework Computer has become the first hardware vendor to formally sponsor the Linux Vendor Firmware Service (LVFS) and Fwupd development, marking a significant step in the project's efforts to secure vendor contributions. The LVFS, which facilitates firmware updates for Linux users with over 135 million downloads, has been actively seeking support through engineering resources or annual dues.

While Red Hat (through lead developer Richard Hughes) and the Linux Foundation have been pivotal, and AMD's Mario Limonciello is a key contributor, Framework's agreement represents the first direct sponsorship under the new initiative. Richard Hughes announced that Framework is a "Startup Sponsor," indicating an annual contribution of around $10,000 USD.

Beyond financial support, Framework is lauded for its positive influence on suppliers, pressuring them to adopt fwupd and LVFS compatibility. Framework devices, including the recent Framework 16 laptop, have already demonstrated strong LVFS/Fwupd integration and general Linux support. This sponsorship sets a precedent, with hopes that other major OEMs will follow suit to enhance the firmware updating experience for Linux customers.
chinese_title: Framework电脑现已赞助LVFS / Fwupd开发
chinese_summary:
Framework 已成为首家正式赞助 Linux 厂商固件服务 (LVFS) 和 Fwupd 开发的硬件厂商，这标志着该项目在争取厂商贡献方面迈出了重要一步。LVFS 致力于为 Linux 用户提供固件更新服务，下载量已超过 1.35 亿次，并一直在积极寻求工程资源或年度会费形式的支持。
